name: Perfect Dunk 3D
description:
Perfect Dunk 3D is a fun and addictive basketball game where your goal is to sink as many baskets as possible.

Hold and drag on the screen to aim your ball in the perfect position possible to dunk your ball, the higher the combo of perfect shots, the more points you gain.

Perfect Dunk features:
- Simple and addictive gameplay
- Completely customisable, unlock new skins for your character and balls
- Stylish and colourful art style
